1632030.name: Soran
1632030.description:
Soran is an arena shooter/RPG being developed, produced, and scored by me, Joseph Keenan. Use classic shooter weapons like the Sniper or Doob Tube, along side new and unique guns like the Defenestrator to finesse your way to victory. When you aren't competing, you can explore the world of Four Shores discovering collectables, making friends or grinding your stats for the next battle. Also there is a flying dog named Friend.

Credits:
Joseph Keenan - Jazzcharles Games
Erica Enriquez - Art
Lauren Maraday - Art
Casey Tebbetts - QA Team
Thomas Pruitt - QA Team
Ricky Williams - QA Team
Alec Romano - QA Team
